title: How do i witch my account to an other email
body: I am wondering is it possible for me to switch my accounts to another email address. If not  {{champion:33}}

replies.body:
You can switch the email tied to your account by visiting [this link](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) if you have access to the email currently tied to it.

If you don't have access to that email, you'll want to reach out to our specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Let me know if you have any questions.
thanks you   and have a nice day
